sentences.en: After reading a biography of Lincoln he was able to tell many stories about the President.
sentences.cn: 他读了林肯的传记后,能讲出许多关于这位总统的故事.

sentences.en: At the end, he ground out the enormous " Biography of George Washington ".
sentences.cn: 最后, 他苦心经营总算写成 卷帙浩繁 的《华盛顿传》.

sentences.en: Biography must to some extent delineate characters.
sentences.cn: 传记必须在一定程度上描绘人物。

sentences.en: Boswell wrote a famous biography of Dr. White.
sentences.cn: 鲍斯韦尔为怀特博士写过一本著名传记.
博斯韦尔写的约翰逊传

sentences.en: He has written a speculative biography of Christopher Marlowe.
sentences.cn: 他写了一篇关于克里斯托弗·马洛的推测性传记。

sentences.en: He is now collecting material for a biography of Tao Yuanming.
sentences.cn: 他正在为写陶渊明传记搜集材料.

sentences.en: I published his auto-biography, which was very competently ghosted by a woman journalist from the Daily Mail.
sentences.cn: 我出版了《每日邮报》的女记者为他代笔的自传，写得颇具文采。

sentences.en: It is not an unsympathetic biography, but Sir Edward has taken against it.
sentences.cn: 这本传记并不惹人厌，可爱德华爵士不喜欢它。

sentences.en: It is, in its way, a maddening biography.
sentences.cn: 客观来说，这部传记很是令人气愤。

sentences.en: Listen to the biography of Natalie Portman.
The publisher upped the ante for the biography by offering 1000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 这家出版社提高了这部传记的预约稿酬,愿比其竞争对手多付1000元.

sentences.en: The reviewer padded out his review with a lengthy biography of the author.
sentences.cn: 评论者在他的评论中添加了冗长的作者生平以拉长篇幅。

sentences.en: This book is a well balanced biography.
sentences.cn: 此书是一部相当客观的传记。

sentences.en: You know, there's a new biography of quisling.
sentences.cn: 最近有本关于卖国贼的新书。

trans.tran_en: a book that tells what has happened in someone’s life, written by someone else
